column5: Looking to go a bit further away from the kawarthas this year my wife really likes this cottage she has seen on bentlly lake I have to say its a very nice cottage but hey im okay as long as i can laydown and make a fire if any one has been there heard about it or any lakes in its area I would really like the feed back Its just south of Bancroft  Peter
I have a buddy that lives on the lake. I'll ask him about the fishing on monday when I see him again. My guess it bass fishing on the lake.

I think that there are pike in the lake; but I am not 100% certain.  It is close to Baptiste & Elephant lakes which have pike, SM & LM bass, muskie, & walleye... Baptiste also has some lake trout.  There are also quite a few trout lakes in the area such as Diamond lake which is stocked with lake trout.

I've been going to this place north of Napanee for 30+ years and now take my family here. Lots of good bass, pike and panfish and a few walleye. http://www.pineridge.cc about the same distance from the GTA as Bancroft area and a really nice beach on a quiet lake  jjcanoe
